price: 106. Ken toobokoyti Nabii Nuuc Yallak mameesittaanaa?keenik iyye waqdi.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum nūḥun alā tattaqūna
